# @lineicons/free-icons

A comprehensive collection of 26,000+ free SVG icons for React applications. High-quality, customizable icons with multiple styles and full TypeScript support.

## âœ¨ Features

- ðŸš€ **26,000+ Icons** - Massive collection covering all categories
- ðŸŽ¨ **Multiple Styles** - Bulk, Solid, Duotone, Outlined, Stroke variants
- âš¡ **Tree Shaking** - Import only the icons you need
- ðŸŽ¯ **TypeScript Support** - Full type definitions included
- ðŸ“¦ **Zero Dependencies** - Lightweight with no external dependencies
- ðŸŽ­ **Consistent API** - Unified interface across all icon styles

## ðŸ“¦ Installation

```bash
npm install @lineiconshq/free-icons
```

## ðŸš€ Quick Start

### Basic Usage

```tsx
import { HomeBulkRounded, SearchOutlinedRounded, UserDuotoneRounded } from '@lineiconshq/free-icons';
```

### Icon Styles

```tsx
import {
  HomeBulkRounded,      // Bold, filled style
  HomeSolidRounded,     // Filled style
  HomeDuotoneRounded,   // Two-tone style
  HomeOutlinedRounded,  // Outline style
  HomeStrokeRounded     // Stroke style
} from '@lineicons/free-icons';
```

## ðŸŽ¨ Icon Props

All icons support these props:

```tsx
interface IconProps extends React.SVGProps<SVGSVGElement> {
  size?: number | string;      // Icon size (default: 24)
  color?: string;              // Icon color (default: 'currentColor')
  strokeWidth?: number | string; // Stroke width for stroke icons (default: 1.5)
  className?: string;          // CSS class name
}
```
